name: Growth - Ludum Dare 34
description:
Sit back, relax, and enjoy the task of creating your own profitable farm! Growth is a game where you work the land, grow your crops, and enjoy a nice profit on the side.

The ludum dare entry page is here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

For feedback, we have a google form we'd love people to fill in. It's available here: http://goo.gl/forms/Yu31b9HL2l
